sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './PrivacyPolicy.css'; // Import the external CSS const PrivacyPolicy = () => { return (

Privacy Policy

Effective Date: [Insert Date]

1. Introduction

Welcome to [Your Website Name] ("we", "our", or "us"). Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use our website [yourwebsite.com].

By accessing or using our Website, you agree to the terms in this Privacy Policy.

2. Information We Collect

  • Personal Information: Name, email, address, phone, payment details.
  • Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device data.
  • Usage Data: Pages visited, clicks, time on site.
  • Cookies: Through browser cookies, pixels, and other tracking tools.

3. How We Collect Data

  • Website forms (contact, registration, subscriptions)
  • Cookies and tracking technologies
  • Analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics)
  • Third-party integrations (e.g., PayPal, Stripe, YouTube)

4. Purpose of Data Collection

  • To operate and improve our website
  • To fulfill transactions or deliver services
  • To respond to customer inquiries
  • To send newsletters or marketing (only with consent)
  • To detect fraud and ensure security

5. Data Storage & Protection

  • SSL encryption and secure protocols (HTTPS)
  • Access-controlled servers and firewalls
  • Authentication and role-based access controls
  • Ongoing monitoring and vulnerability scanning

Note: No online system is 100% secure. You use our services at your own risk.

6. Your Rights

For EU Users (GDPR):

  • Right to access, correct, delete, or restrict your data
  • Right to object to marketing or profiling
  • Right to data portability

For California Users (CCPA):

  • Right to know what data is collected
  • Right to request deletion
  • Right to opt-out of data sales
  • Right to non-discriminatory treatment

To exercise your rights, email us at [Insert Email Address].

7. Sharing Your Data

We may share your data with:

  • Service providers (hosting, analytics, payment)
  • Advertising platforms (with user consent)
  • Government or law enforcement (as required)
  • Successors in case of a merger or acquisition

We do not sell your personal data.

8. Cookies & Tracking

We use cookies to enhance user experience, analytics, and personalized ads. You may manage cookies through browser settings or opt-out banners.

9. Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Revisions will be posted here with a new effective date.

10. Contact Information

Email: [Insert Email Address]

Address: [Insert Physical Address if needed]

This Privacy Policy complies with applicable data protection laws including GDPR and CCPA.

); }; export default PrivacyPolicy;
